channel.title: Taken (2008/9)
channel.description:
[b]Plot:[/b] A former spy relies on his old skills to save his estranged daughter, who has been forced into the slave trade.
Great movie, I was gonna write a review but then I realized I was too lazy. I strongly recommend you downloading it now if you can't watch it in your country yet.
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0936501/releaseinfo]Release Dates[/url]

item.title: Taken (2008/9)
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

I agree, this is one of the best movies i have watched in a while! Quite old now, i had it since February! but never-the-less, brilliant film.

9/10
